summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account activity of Jeffrey Epstein for the month of February 2015. It includes information on account balances, transactions, and debits, highlighting significant withdrawals and payments made during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the primary individual associated with the account detailed in this financial statement, showing his financial transactions and account balance.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account balance at the beginning of February 2015 was $393,811.08.
Significant debits included checks and preauthorized payments totaling over $100,000.
The ending balance as of February 28, 2015, was $190,815.95.
Multiple transactions were made to ADP for tax and payroll services.
The document includes a note about the confidentiality of the account information.
